pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Entire Solution Paths for ROC-SVM // We develop the entire solution paths for ROC-SVM presented by Rakotomamonjy. The ROC- SVM solution path algorithm greatly facilitates the tuning procedure for regularization parameter, lambda in ROC-SVM by avoiding grid search algorithm which may be computationally too intensive. For more information on the ROC-SVM, see the report in the ROC Analysis in AI workshop(ROCAI-2004) : Hernndez- Orallo, Jos, et al. (2004) doi:10.1145/1046456.1046489.
